name: meal-prep-market-server
description: Meal Prep Market is an e-commerce site in which the primary user is someone who provides meal prep services, and the other user is someone who is interested in having meals prepped for them. This would allow people who offer meal prep services to easily advertise their offerings to local customers who, for various reasons (weight loss, time, etc.), want prepped meals to pick up or to be delivered to them.
author: Gabrielle Ford
